attributes.action: Give NHS staff a proper pay rise
attributes.background: The NHS work force are under extreme pressures. Most areas within the NHS are at breaking point. The 1% rise in pay will actually work out as a 1.6%pay cut for NHS staff. They are struggling and need a pay rise now.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining how much you would like the pay rise for NHS staff to be.
